review: I purposely waited at least 3 months to review this item because it's still so new.  For the first few weeks, we could stream Netflix with absolutely no problems.  About 2 weeks ago, it started "freezing" during play - the movie just stops dead for about 30 seconds while it "reloads".  This is INTENSELY annoying!!!Yesterday, while I was updating some of my software, I noticed that Google dropped a "BETA" update to the Chromecast.  At this point, the Chromecast will be returned as soon as possible since it now freezes up no less than 10 times per 90 minute movie.  Don't waste your cash on this one, folks.
author: Nancy Barnhart "itsonlybeadz"
